Module org.autogui
Package org.autogui.swing.util

Interface PopupExtension.PopupMenuFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    Enclosing class:
    PopupExtension
    public static interface PopupExtension.PopupMenuFilter
    the function interface for menu filtering

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default List<Object> aroundItems​(boolean before)
      a menu-builder calls the method before and after of a building process and appends returned items

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        Object convert​(Object item)
        Parameters:
        item - a converted item, one of JComponent (including JMenuItem), Action, TableTargetCellAction or PopupCategorized.CategorizedMenuItem
        Returns:
        a converted item or null if not matched

      • convertItems

        default <T> List<T> convertItems​(Class<T> type,
                                 Iterable<? extends T> items)

      • aroundItems

        default List<Object> aroundItems​(boolean before)
        a menu-builder calls the method before and after of a building process and appends returned items
        Parameters:
        before - true if before of a building process or false if after of the process.
        Returns:
        additional menu items provided by the filter. it needs to return once for the same item list
